name: Define Positive Booking Scenario
scenario: Positive scenario for defining a booking scenario with valid data.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Prepare valid booking data with tripType as 'RoundTrip', passengerType as 'Adult', paymentMethod as 'CreditCard', and fareClass as 'Economy'. 2. Submit the booking data to the Airline Booking System. 3. Verify that the booking scenario is successfully created and stored.
expected_result: Booking scenario is created successfully and stored in the system.

name: Define Negative Booking Scenario
scenario: Negative scenario for defining a booking scenario with invalid data.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Prepare invalid booking data with tripType as 'InvalidType', passengerType as 'Child', paymentMethod as 'InvalidMethod', and fareClass as 'InvalidClass'. 2. Submit the booking data to the Airline Booking System. 3. Verify that the system returns an error indicating invalid booking data.
expected_result: Error message is returned indicating invalid booking data.

name: Store Booking Scenarios in JSON Format
scenario: Positive scenario for storing booking scenarios in JSON format.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Prepare valid booking scenarios in JSON format. 2. Submit the JSON data to the Airline Booking System for storage. 3. Verify that the booking scenarios are stored correctly in JSON format.
expected_result: Booking scenarios are stored correctly in JSON format.

name: Store Booking Scenarios in CSV Format
scenario: Positive scenario for storing booking scenarios in CSV format.
label: API_Validation
test_steps: 1. Prepare valid booking scenarios in CSV format. 2. Submit the CSV data to the Airline Booking System for storage. 3. Verify that the booking scenarios are stored correctly in CSV format.
expected_result: Booking scenarios are stored correctly in CSV format.
